titles: The fovr-legg'd elder, or, A horrible relation of a dog and an elders maid to the tune of The lady's fall.
author: Birkenhead, John, Sir, 1616-1679.
notes: Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 246) and in the Harvard University Library (reel 1790).
